summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6291 for the improvement of West Plymouth St. from Thorndyke Ave. West to approximately 570 feet east by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No 92388 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
